text: St John's Innovation Centre (SJIC) is a famous company which helps small companies to grow. It is in Cambridge, Cambridgeshire, England. It was started in 1987 in St John’s College, Cambridge, near the Cambridge Science Park. ==Other websites== *Official website *SJIC at Cambridge Network *News on BBC *Some info at The World Bank *SJIC’ pictures Category:Organisations based in Cambridge Category:Companies of England Category:1987 establishments in England
title: St John's Innovation Centre
